snippet: This new restaurant, with unusual, original pizzas and visually arresting appetizers, makes a good case for patience.
abstract: Pete Wells reviews Bruno restaurant in East Village.
lead_paragraph: This new restaurant, with unusual, original pizzas and visually arresting appetizers, makes a good case for patience.

headline.print_headline: It’s Not the Pizza, It’s the Enablers
headline.main: Restaurant Review: Bruno in the East Village
